newsitem.title: USA: AFTER THE BELL -- Quiet descends after hours.
newsitem.headline: AFTER THE BELL -- Quiet descends after hours.

text.p: Traders said on Friday an already calm trading day came to a halt after hours.

The New York Stock Exchange said its session one volume was 5,000 shares compared to 3,500 shares on Thursday. Session two volume was 1,908,600 shares compared to 451,741 shares on Thursday, the NYSE said.
The American Stock Exchange said there was no after-hours volume.
